Package me.mafrans.hangman

Class HangmanManager

java.lang.Object
me.mafrans.hangman.HangmanManager
public class HangmanManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class managing the showing and hiding of letters, as well as the UI rendering.

Since:
1.0

    • tryLetter

      public boolean tryLetter​(java.lang.String letter)
      Attempts to show a letter, increases failures if it fails to show any letter.
      Parameters:
      letter - The letter to try for
      Returns:
      True if any letter in the current word was shown

    • showLetter

      public boolean showLetter​(java.lang.String letter)
      Try to show a specific letter in the current word.
      Parameters:
      letter - The letter to show
      Returns:
      True if any letter in the current word was shown

    • showAll

      public void showAll()
      Show all letters in the current word.

    • render

      public void render​(int failures)
      Render an ascii image representing the amount of failures inputted. Also renders the current word, replacing any hidden letters with '_'.
      Parameters:
      failures - The amount of failures to render as

    • render

      public void render()
      Render an ascii image representing the current amount of failures. Also renders the current word, replacing any hidden letters with '_'.
